attributes.action: persuade Revenue & Customs to give prizes for early submission of Tax Returns online.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we have to keep having the stick of penalties for late submission waved at us all the time? Carrots work much better - how about a 10% reduction in our tax bill if we submit our return within 2 weeks of the end of the Tax Year?
